about_the_game:
Introducing the "Supporter Pack 1" DLC, a fantastic collection of exclusive skins that not only amps up your soldier's look but also shows your support towards the developers. With awesome armor parts and weapon skins, you'll rock the battlefield in style while expressing your appreciation for the hard work behind the game.

This Pack Contains Skins for:


Assault Rifles
  • ScarH
  • G36C
  • HK419
  • M4A1
  • FAL
  • AUG
  • ASVAL
  • AK15
  • ACR
  • AK5C
  • AK74
  • ?

SMG
  • MP5
  • MP7
  • UMP45
  • Kriss Vector
  • Scorpion EVO


Pistols:
  • M9
  • USP
  • MP443
  • M9

Long Range Rifles:
  • L96
  • MK14
  • MK20
  • SV-98

LMGs
  • M249
  • MG36
  • ?
  • ?


The Pack does also features Content for non- released content already! It will unlock once the Items go public.

Also featuring the following Armors:


Backpacks:
  • US - Travelpack
  • RU - Travelpack

Helmets:
    Universal (All Classes)
  • US - Hoodiecover
  • US - Glasses & Scarf
  • RU - Ushanka

    Support Class
  • US - Eisengard
  • RU - Killer
  • RU - Spacemarine
  • US - Future War

    Engineer
  • RU- Drivercap

content_descriptors.notes: BattleBit Remastered features action based, military themed gameplay. As a result, there are displays of combat and war. Gunfire, explosions, death. There is no gore, and visual display of violence is not exaggerated.

name: BattleBit Remastered - Supporter Pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Generation and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 600 Series or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get Your Style On with Support Pack 1! This pack delivers stunning cosmetic upgrades to elevate your look while supporting the incredible devs behind the scenes. Unreleased weapons are expected by Q4 2025!
